data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Štip. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Štip, North Macedonia

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Štip, North Macedonia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Štip to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Štip do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Štip hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, help the 73 believers in Štip to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Štip, North Macedonia has a population of 43,700.

We estimate Štip has 73 people who might know Jesus, 27,009 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,618 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 598 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Štip, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
